landing.title: Data saves lives
landing.content: Accelerator for Digital Tools vs Covid-19 helping them getting to the public faster

initiatives.content:
In order to contain COVID-19, a worldwide competition of ideas is emerging, significantly accelerated by the tech industry and others. We are not only bringing together the resources and capabilities of the German digital economy. We also seek and promote open exchange with other digital initiatives so that the ideas with the greatest potential can prevail. 

 Here you will find exciting digital initiatives and technologies from around the world - continuously updated. If you would like to add more projects to this showcase, please contact us.

main.title:
#GesundZusammen – 
an Accelerator initiated by the digital economy
main.content:
As broad alliance of German tech companies, we want to actively help society, politics and business to contain COVID-19 with digital solutions. We have founded an Accelerator program that provide resources to bring promising Digital Tools to the public faster.

So that private things remain private.
Even in times of crisis, people's freedom and personal rights are top priority for our technology.

To keep Germany healthy
The Digital Tools supported in the Accelerator program are designed to help protect risk groups better and relieve the burden on the healthcare system.

To get the economy moving
Technology can be employed to reduce health risks in companies and help boost economic activity again.

initiative.title: Our Program
initiative.content: A number of 6-10 digital projects are supported by the targeted #Gesundzusammen Accelerator program.

support.title: Support System
support.content: Through the contributing partners we're offering a wide range of support services from tech to marketing and institutional access to all participants.

ecosystem.title: Open Ecosystem
ecosystem.content: We are investing into building an active Ecosystem by providing a database of all relevant Covid-19 initiatives, and other outreach activities.

header.title: Program
header.content: Accelerator for Digital Tools vs Covid-19 helping them getting to the public faster

program.title: The #Gesundzusammen Accelerator Program
program.content:
- Finance a minimum of six new ideas with €20,000 each of equity-free capital. Possibly expanding the scope to 10 ideas.
- Launch an open call for digital tools addressing the COVID-19 crisis by April 6th. 
- Decide quickly with a jury board, and fast track applications on a rolling basis, with the goal of having all program participants announced by April 10th.
- Provide free resources (products & services) through the partners involved. 
- Provide mentorship by topic experts (C- and VP-Level) through the partners involved.
- Amplify reach by combining partner channels and media network.
- Provide Weekly Updates, and a 30th of April and 31st of May Demo Day.
-> End of Batch #1 is 31st of May.

partners.title: Founding & Tech Partners
partners.claim: Want to help make a difference?

faqs.title: Questions?

content.title: About us
content.content: We as a broad alliance of German Tech companies, want to actively help society, politics and economy to contain COVID-19 with digital solutions. To achieve this, we are building on one of the most important resources available to the world today: Information.

content.title: Why GesundZusammen?
content.content: In order to contain COVID-19, a worldwide competition of ideas is emerging, significantly accelerated by the tech industry and others. We are not only bringing together the resources and capabilities of the German digital economy. We also seek and promote open exchange with other digital initiatives so that the ideas with the greatest potential can prevail.

content.title: What is your goal?
content.content: Data enables us to do research together, warn people, save lives. And yet the widespread use of data is not without risk: in the face of the crisis, there are increasing voices calling for fundamental rights to be sacrificed for the benefit of health. Together we will prove the point: We can have both infection control and privacy.

content.title: Are you looking for more partners?
content.content: We are always open to other partners who would like to contribute their skills and resources to protect the health of society.

content.title: What do you think about the work of the health system, doctors and nursing staff?
content.content: We admire and support the work of everyone in the health system. This is why we want to contribute together to improving their work situation and the data basis of their daily decisions through technology.

content.title: Do you support digital tools also financially from the initiative?
content.content: Our most valuable resource is our competent employees working in agile teams. Putting them at the service of the community now is our contribution for overcoming this crisis. Do you have a problem you want to solve? Please contact us.

faqs.contact: For more questions, please contact: Solveig Rathenow <media@gesund-zusammen.de>
